    UnicodeFun.to_fraction — Function.

    Turns given numerator and denominator into a fraction: to_fraction("a-123", 392) --> ᵃ⁻¹²³⁄₃₉₂ Restricted to characters that can be turned into superscript and subscript. For a more general translation, see tofractionnl (newline)

    UnicodeFun.to_fraction_nl — Function.

    Turns given numerator and denominator into a fraction with a newline: ``` to_fraction("α² ⋅ α²⁺³ ≡ α⁷", " ℝ: 𝐴𝐯 = λᵢ𝐯") –>

    α̲²̲ ̲⋅̲ ̲α̲²̲⁺̲³̲ ̲≡̲ ̲α̲⁷̲ ℝ: 𝐴𝐯 = λᵢ𝐯 ```
